ca.ualberta.adapters
Class SelectionGridAdapter

java.lang.Object
  BaseAdapter
      ca.ualberta.adapters.SelectionGridAdapter

public class SelectionGridAdapter
extends BaseAdapter

Reusable adapter that can be used to display PhotoEntry images, dates, along with a checkbox underneath to allow the selection of a particular photo. So far, this adapter is used in the CompareSelectionActivity and ArchiveActivity.

Constructor Detail

SelectionGridAdapter

public SelectionGridAdapter(Context c,
                            java.util.ArrayList<PhotoEntry> list,
                            java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> selected)
Instantiates a new SelectionGridAdapter with a context, a list of PhotoEntry objects, and a list of checkbox positions.

Parameters:
c - Context that is used to retrieve a LayoutInflater efficiently.
list - A shared list of PhotoEntry objects that are used to populate the adapter.
selected - A shared list of booleans, where each position refers to the state of a checkbox for a photo cell.
Method Detail

setOnClickListener

public void setOnClickListener(OnClickListener listener)
Sets the listener for the checkbox of each photo cell.

Parameters:
listener - The listener that is called when the checkbox is clicked.

setFixedChecked

public void setFixedChecked(int pos)
Sets the position of the checkbox that is to be checked, but don't allow the user to change it's state.

Parameters:
pos - Position of checkbox that is to be fixed.
